attributes.additional_details: I want a total ban on babestation tv and all other adult stations. These stations are supposed to be soft porn, but how can we ban porn for children on the internet and have it on freeview tv for anyone under the age of 18, these channels are a total disgrace and degrade women as meat and totaly gives out the wrong impression about women, ban these stations or make them  pay per view so people over 18 are the only ones to view this crap

rejection.details: This is a matter for Ofcom to decide upon.
